]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api

function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if (api.item.value.selected == false) {
    return 'none';
  } else {
    return 'arrow-right-fill';
  }

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-22 12:55:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>b70b95db8315d610b68c9640ceaad348</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>icon_1/icon</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drama" source="x_pamtn_drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b70b95db8315d610b68c9640ceaad348</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-22 12:55:25</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
